title: The Truth II
overview: With the help of his team, young detective Xiao Yi solved one confusing case after another in Xiacheng. Under the design of the mysterious revenger Bai Zhe, he was involved in an unsolved case that had been pending for many years. With their respective positions in mind, the collision between good and evil creates an echo of fate. The fog cleared, the sun shone on the earth, and peace returned to Xia City.
